value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|This year's winter festival is so...
festive! And there are so many
people too! ...Oh, Princess Fjorm!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Thank you for inviting me to enjoy
your winter festival. It is quite the
production you put on...$k$pIt's like walking through a dream,
being here at such a lovely festival
with $Nu...$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Fjorm, hey!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Ylgr! You're here too?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I heard there were presents at this
winter festival, so I couldn't pass up
the opportunity!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That's right! Speaking of which, we'd
all better do our best out there!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Yay, snow! All right! Wheee!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|Hm? ...Brother? Where did he
disappear to now?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Hey, c'mon! Play with me!
Before it melts!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|Fae, I—$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Play with me, I said!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|Er, all right... But just for a moment!
Our enemies could be just out of
sight, after all...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|It's freezing out here, but playing will
keep us warm! Yeah!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_WinterFes18,Face|All right, now let's go rejoin Ephraim.
Come now, this way.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_WinterFes18,Face|Aw! I wish I could build snowmen
forever... It's so fun!$k$p$Sbs150|
